title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 455.57 - Sold services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 455.57 - Sold services

State Regulations

This functional reporting center must contain all the
expenses related to the sale of services to individuals or enterprises outside
of and unrelated to the ordinary functions of the residential health care
facility. Activities would include but are not limited to the following: housekeeping services; laundry and linen services; data processing; management
services; education services; janitorial services; purchasing; laboratory, etc. (a) Standard unit of measure. None. (b) Data source. Not
applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
455.57

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
